name: Mini Bow
description: Ddg+20, An easy-to-use, short-range bow. Effective: Flying.

name: Iron Bow
description: A standard bow made of iron. Effective: Flying.

name: Steel Bow
description: A bow made of steel. Effective: Flying.

name: Silver Bow
description: An exceptional bow of rare metals. Effective: Flying.

name: Longbow
description: A bow made to fire at longer ranges. Effective: Flying.

name: Killer Bow
description: A bow especially well-suited to inflicting deadly wounds. Effective: Flying.

name: Radiant Bow
description: A magical bow whose arrows pierce with light. Effective: Flying.

name: Brave Bow
description: A bow built for expert wielders. If user initiates combat, attacks twice. Effective: Flying.

name: Lendabair
description: A bow wielded by legends. Effective: Flying.

name: Croissbow
description: Ddg+10, A bow with a sweet scent. Disappears when consumed as an item, but recovers user’s HP.

name: Master Bow
description: (Used during Emblem Leif’s Engage attack)

name: Parthia
description: Bow wielded by Emblem Lucina. Doubles user’s earned experience. Grants Res+5. Effective: Flying.

name: Parthia (Normal)
description: Bow wielded by Emblem Lucina. Doubles user’s earned experience. Grants Res+5. Effective: Flying.

name: Killer Bow
description: Bow wielded by Emblem Lyn. Easily inflicts fatal wounds. Effective: Flying.

description: Bow wielded by Emblem Lyn. Effective: Flying.

name: Killer Bow (Ch 10)
description: An Emblem’s bow. Easy to inflict a fatal wound with. Effective: Flying.

name: Mulagir
description: Mighty bow wielded by Emblem Lyn. Grants Spd+5. Effective: Flying, Dragon.

name: Failnaught
description: Bow wielded by Emblem Byleth. If user initiates combat, grants Avo+20. Effective: Dragon, Flying.

description: Bow wielded by Emblem Claude. If user initiates combat, grants Avo+20. Effective: Dragon, Flying.
